author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Government Of Puerto Rico Calls Proposed G.O.-COFINA Settlement Not Acceptable
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Government of Puerto Rico:
* GOVERNMENT OF PUERTO RICO CALLS PROPOSED G.O.-COFINA SETTLEMENT “NOT ACCEPTABLE” - STATEMENT
* GOVERNMENT OF PUERTO RICO SAYS THE BONDHOLDER-PROPOSED SETTLEMENT WOULD CREATE DEBT SERVICE REQUIREMENTS THAT ARE NOT SUSTAINABLE - STATEMENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: [ ]
